question: Who formed the South Korean boy group EXO?
predAns: EXO was formed by S.M. Entertainment in 2011. The group debuted in 2012. The members were individually introduced through 23 different teaser trailers. Their debut extended play, "Mama," was released in April 2012. EXO-K's leader, Suho, was the first member to join SM Entertainment. He trained for seven years prior to debuting. Baekhyun was the last member to join EXO. He joined in 2011. Kai, the group’s main dancer, was recruited through the company’s street casting system. He joined SM Entertainment in 2007.
